channel.title: Bots everywhere!
channel.description: All over general discussion, linking to strange sites!

item.title: Bots everywhere!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I guess maybe Mopman deleted them all, I don’t see any. If it ends up being a problem, I can probably implement a better captcha system or the like to fight it, assuming a bot got in (the current captcha is pretty good as-is). If it is just poorly paid people registering accounts and making the posts, there isn’t really any way to combat that automatically.

You could always make some changes to the forum code so that any post made by an account which is less than x days old that contains a hyperlink to an external site is marked as ‘moderated’, or something like that.
No other solutions come to mind though.

Read full topic
